subject: Horses
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: More than 2,200 equestrians and their entourages descend on Saugerties, N.Y., every summer, and the influx of cash has played a part in transforming the village.
snippet: More than 2,200 equestrians and their entourages descend on Saugerties, N.Y., every summer, and the influx of cash has played a part in transforming the village.
